title: MOVIE TIME!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hey everyone! I’ve got some suuuper juicy news today~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh, what is it!? Are there going to be free extra servings of ramen somewhere!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Maybe it’s a secret gig by a famous punk band~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’d be nice if it were an autograph session by a novelist~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>If it’s all-you-can-eat hamburgers, I might go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You sure raised the bar for this juicy news, Kasumin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ughh... You’re all wrong! The answer is... the awesomest movie is going to be premiering todayyyy~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>So it’s not about extra ramen~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>A movie still sounds nice, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>The acoustics in a movie theater are the best 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What kind of movie is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No, no, no! Kasumin won’t give any spoilers! Buuuut I highly, highly recommend it, so let’s go see it right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ramen~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>We’ll get ramen after the movie!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yay, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Now, everyone! Let’s go~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
